title: Hi!   can you tell what\'s going on near the Brunswick/Columbus county line on hwy 74/76?  There\'s a large, long cleared area on both sides of the hwy and crews are working daily....thanks
text:
I believe this link to a story at StarNewsOnline.com will answer your
question:
